detailsData.title: Experienced Team
detailsData.content: The trial lawyers at William Schwitzer & Associates combine years of experience, dedication, and compassion to ensure each client receives superior legal representation.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Practice
detailsData.content: Whether your injuries resulted from a construction site accident, a car accident, by a defective product, or if you were the victim of medical malpractice, our team of trial lawyers in NYC can help.

detailsData.title: No Fee Unless Win
detailsData.content: All cases are handled on a contingent fee basis, which means you risk nothing. There is never an attorney fee for us unless there is a recovery for you.

detailsData.title: Record of Excellence
detailsData.content: William Schwitzer & Associates has been recognized by peers and professional organizations for the dedicated legal service and professional representation of their clients in the courtroom.

valueProp: William Schwitzer & Associates is dedicated to protecting the rights of the injured against insurance companies and big corporations. We’ve recovered hundreds of millions of dollars for our clients and we want to help you too.

testimonalData.text: I take tremendous pride in my firm's reputation for being one of the top personal injury law firms in New York state. As lead trial attorney, I am humbled by our clients’ recognition of the hard work, pride and compassion we devote to each and every client; and the recognition they have that my office is a premier personal injury law firm.
testimonalData.author: William Schwitzer
